segments.text: I'm watching this family moment in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a nice garden view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, the sink is causing a flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's overflowing, making a big puddle on the tile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mom is drying dishes, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so content with her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are trying to get cookies secretly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is stretched so high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool doesn't look stable at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting patiently below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for them if something goes wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies in the jar look delicious though.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This domestic chaos is kind of heartbreaking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Hope the water doesn't ruin the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR
